introduction: The branch of biomedical instrumentation concerned with the study and functions of Electrocardiogram (ECG), Electroencephalogram (EEG) and Blood Pressure and monitoring involving in the analysis of EEG, ECG and blood pressure.

experiments.name: Study of Various Leads for Monitoring of Electrocardiogram (ECG)
Monitoring of Electrocardiogram (ECG) for bipolar limb leads L1, L2 and L3
Monitoring of Electrocardiogram (ECG) for augmented leads aVL, aVF and aVR
Monitoring of Electrocardiogram (ECG) for chest leads V1-V6
Study of various leads and electrode position for Electroencephalogram (EEG)
Study of various leads present in different lobes
Monitoring of Electroencephalogram (EEG) signal for different lobes

objective: 1. To study Various Leads for Monitoring of Electrocardiogram (ECG).</br>2. To monitor Electrocardiogram (ECG) for bipolar limb leads L1, L2 and L3.</br>3. To monitor Electrocardiogram (ECG) for augmented leads aVL, aVF and aVR.</br>4. To monitor Electrocardiogram (ECG) for chest leads V1-V6.</br>5. To study various leads and electrode position for Electroencephalogram (EEG).</br>6. To study of various leads present in different lobes.</br>7. To monitor Electroencephalogram (EEG) signal for different lobes.</br>8. To monitor Blood Pressure.
exp_name: Monitoring of Electroencephalogram (EEG) signal for different lobes
